koreanDramas.title: Crash Landing on You
koreanDramas.description: A South Korean heiress accidentally lands in North Korea and meets an army officer who helps her hide.

koreanDramas.title: Itaewon Class
koreanDramas.description: An ex-con and his friends fight to make their street bar a success while facing challenges from a powerful rival.

koreanDramas.title: Goblin
koreanDramas.description: An immortal goblin seeks a bride to end his cursed eternal life.

koreanDramas.title: Vincenzo
koreanDramas.description: A Korean-Italian mafia lawyer returns to Korea and gets involved in a battle against corrupt officials.

koreanDramas.title: Kingdom
koreanDramas.description: Set in Korea’s Joseon era, a crown prince faces a zombie apocalypse while dealing with political conspiracies.

koreanDramas.title: Start-Up
koreanDramas.description: Young entrepreneurs compete for success and love in the cutthroat world of Korea’s high-tech industry.

koreanDramas.title: Descendants of the Sun
koreanDramas.description: A soldier and a doctor navigate their professional duties and personal feelings in a war-torn country.

koreanDramas.title: My Love from the Star
koreanDramas.description: An alien stranded on Earth falls in love with a famous actress just as his departure nears.

koreanDramas.title: Hotel Del Luna
koreanDramas.description: A haunted hotel’s manager and its mysterious owner help spirits resolve unfinished business.

koreanDramas.title: The Heirs
koreanDramas.description: Rich high school students navigate love and friendship while dealing with their family pressures.

koreanDramas.title: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
koreanDramas.description: A young lawyer with autism spectrum disorder takes on challenging cases and finds her place in the legal world.

koreanDramas.title: Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha
koreanDramas.description: A dentist moves to a seaside village and finds herself drawn to a mysterious handyman.
